Message.Title: this is the next $200 stock--do you ebay?
Message.Msg: It's a juggernaught. A new paradigm. Go to a garage sale a look at the kids who do this for a living. Everyone wants to ebay. Some are still scared. That leaves room for growth for ebay, and me too until garage sales become extinct. The charge me a fortune, and I still make a killing. Good combo. Good platform (much room for improvement tho) and a great and timley story. Yummy.

Message.Title: Is Ebay inadvertantly creating armys of con artist consumers
Message.Msg: There is a new trend on Ebay.. consumers buy broken merchandice for pennies on the dollar and then buy the same item brand new,.. they then swap the damaged item for the new one and send the damaged item back to the seller of the new item for a refund...Because of the damage that a negative feedback can do to your account sellers are inclined to eat the damaged item and move on.. Problem is , this breeds more fraudulent buyer behavior..ebay eventually takes notice of the bad buyers after they repeatedly offend but no restitution is given to the seller. the problem started when Ebay enacted a policy that prohibited sellers leavin negative feedback. This put buyers ad an advantage in transaction..example a buyer gets a broken 32 gb memory stick at a flee market for $2.00 they then buy the same memory stick for $79 on Ebay and then send the broken one back to the seller ofthe good one..Now the buyer has a new memory stick for $2.00... they can sell it for $50 or more and make a tidy profit...As these armys of con artist grow it will be a challange to the Ebay concept

Message.Title: Mini Vacation to: Las Vegas
Message.Msg: Yesterday was our 25th Wedding Anniversary Since moving to a new area and not sure what we wanted to do we went with a spur of the moment thought! ~ Las Vegas Drove there last night gambled all night long and drove home this morning. If anyone here goes to Vegas be sure to see the Downtown Rock Laser Show on Fremont Street. (it's FREE and they have many shows everynight)
